meta.title: Alan Fernandes - Full Stack Developer
meta.description: Hi, I'm Alan! I'm a full stack developer based in Curitiba, Brazil, experienced with UX and developing static websites.

about.title: about_me
about.content: I'm a full stack dev based in Curitiba, Brazil, with a bachelor's degree in design by the Federal University of Technology of Paraná. I have worked previously as a UX designer, but I have always been attracted to web development. I worked as a freelance web developer for 3 years, designing landing pages and corporate websites. Not only that, but in my previous UX job I did a lot of more technical work, such as project documentation, and information architecture — I even got to design an API. This background in UX allows me to seamlessly bridge the gap between design and development, ensuring that the design is implemented in its tiniest details, and that I can efficiently communicate with the design team when changes are needed.

skills.title: my_skills
skills.content: My experience developing static websites, provides me with have a very strong knowledge of HTML and CSS (I prefer using SCSS) and vanilla JS. More recently, I started delving into Nuxt (Vue) and Astro for website development, and React for dynamic applications.

project1.description: An app with character prompts for tabletop RPGs, that dynamically creates backgrounds and lets the user chat with the character using Open AI's API.
